title: Help Please i am trying to install this game
body:
i am trying to install this game and i keep getting and error - pvp.net patcher kernal- error not working ,  i have uninstalled the game and re downloaded it multiple times and it keeps popping up, any help would be amazing thank you. 
i really wanna start playing this game again.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you tried running the launcher as Administrator? (Right click, run as admin)
Have you tried launching the client in compatibility mode?
